EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / Catrise Paige (1340649098.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Catrise Paige (1340649098.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Thanks for the update and your welcome. I wish you speedy recovery with your health concerns and I’ll be here when you get ready to take on your next consulting project. Regards, Steve From: catrise.ws@gmail.com [mailto:catrise.ws@gmail.com] On Behalf Of Catrise Paige Sent: Thursday, June 21, 2012 4:00 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Catrise Paige Thanks for your email, Steve! Just to update, I have been looking for the right position for quite some time now. I'm also in transition due to a health concern, so everything has sort of been placed on hold. I'll be sure to update you when I can. Thanks again! CatriseOn Jun 21, 2012 10:54 AM, "Steve Arhancet" <sarhancet@mbopartners.com <mailto:sarhancet@mbopartners.com>> wrote: Dear Catrise, We had a conversation some time ago regarding our services. As a courtesy I wanted to follow up and get an update from you. We also are now publishing an Independent Consulting Brief. It's a monthly email that provides access to a convenient list of relevant resources, tools and best practices. You can sign up for it by going to http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief <http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief>. Feel free to provide an update by simply replying to this email.
